name: Healing Potion
description: Restores a small amount of HP.

name: Mana Elixir
description: Replenishes a small amount of mana.

name: Iron Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of iron.

name: Leather Armor
description: Light armor made of leather.

name: Gold Coins
description: A small pouch of gold coins.

name: Antidote
description: Cures poison.

name: Fire Scroll
description: A scroll that casts a fire spell.

name: Steel Helmet
description: A helmet made of steel.

name: Silver Ring
description: A silver ring with intricate engravings.

name: Mithril Dagger
description: A lightweight dagger made of mithril.

name: Stamina Potion
description: Restores a small amount of stamina.

name: Chainmail Armor
description: Heavy armor made of interlocking chains.

name: Sapphire Gem
description: A precious sapphire gem.

name: Ice Wand
description: A wand that shoots ice bolts.

name: Bronze Shield
description: A sturdy shield made of bronze.

name: Smoke Bomb
description: Creates a cloud of smoke, allowing for escape.

name: Enchanted Bow
description: A bow imbued with magical energy.

name: Golden Amulet
description: An amulet made of pure gold.

name: Invisibility Cloak
description: A cloak that renders the wearer invisible.

name: Poison Dagger
description: A dagger coated with deadly poison.

name: Mana Crystal
description: A crystal that replenishes a moderate amount of mana.

description: Armor made from the scales of a dragon.

name: Silver Chalice
description: A chalice made of silver with gem encrusted.

name: Staff of Healing
description: A staff that heals the wielder.

name: Titan Shield
description: A massive shield that offers great protection.

name: Haste Potion
description: Increases movement speed temporarily.

name: Vorpal Sword
description: A sword with a razor-sharp blade.

name: Emerald Necklace
description: A necklace with a large emerald pendant.

name: Frost Armor
description: Armor that protects against cold attacks.

name: Cloak of Invisibility
description: A cloak that grants temporary invisibility.

name: Ring of Protection
description: A ring that enhances defense.

name: Wand of Fireballs
description: A wand that shoots fireballs.

name: Boots of Speed
description: Boots that increase movement speed.

name: Elven Bow
description: A finely crafted bow from the elven lands.

name: Dragon Scales
description: Rare scales from a dragon.

name: Amulet of Health
description: An amulet that increases maximum health.

name: Helmet of Night Vision
description: A helmet that grants night vision.

name: Skeleton Key
description: A key that can unlock any lock.

name: Warhammer of Thunder
description: A hammer that summons thunderbolts.

name: Robe of the Archmage
description: A robe worn by powerful archmages.

name: Philosopher's Stone
description: A legendary stone that grants immense power.

name: Enchanted Quiver
description: A quiver that replenishes arrows.

name: Staff of the Necromancer
description: A staff used by necromancers to summon the undead.

name: Gauntlets of Strength
description: Gauntlets that increase strength.

name: Orb of Destruction
description: An orb that causes massive destruction.

name: Crown of the King
description: A crown worn by the rightful king.

name: Ring of Regeneration
description: A ring that speeds up health regeneration.

name: Cloak of Shadows
description: A cloak that blends the wearer into the shadows.

name: Wand of Polymorph

name: Elixir of Life
description: A rare elixir that fully restores health and mana.
